registrierkasseUuid.description: The `_uuid` of the `Registrierkasse` to retrieve the `Beleg` collection.

format.description: Determines the format of the `Beleg` collection.

limit.description: Limits the number of returned results.

offset.description: Skips the specified number of results from the result set.

before.description: Only return results that where saved before the specified date-time string (i.e., anything that `Date.parse()` can parse).

after.description: Only return results that where saved after the specified date-time string (i.e., anything that `Date.parse()` can parse).

gte.description: Only return results that have at least a particular `Belegnummer`.

lte.description: Only return results that have at most a particular `Belegnummer`.
